trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja would have you collect ingredients for a botanical tonic.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Ankledeep)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Ankledeep)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Ankledeep)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_000<tab>The crops are coming along nicely for the most part, but I'm a little concerned for the few plants that aren't thriving quite as much.

TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>I see some yellowing leaves here and there, some slow growers and the like... So after discussing the matter with Anggir, we've decided to make a vitalization tonic and I would like your help with gathering one of the prime ingredients.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>The tonic we made for the struggling plants seems to be doing the trick, so I'd like to mix up some more for future use.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>A quality tonic requires quality ingredients, however, and who better to procure them than you?
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>If you're in the vicinity of Ankledeep, you should be able to find deposits of the mineral dust we need. Watch your step out there!
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>If you're in the vicinity of Ankledeep, you should be able to harvest the viscous nectar we need. Watch your step out there!

TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>If you find yourself at Ankledeep, you should be able to catch the particular thick-boned fish we need. Golden stonefly nymphs are the best bait to use, I hear.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Procurement of the mineral dust we need falls to you. It should be found somewhere around Ankledeep.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>Procurement of the viscous nectar we need falls to you. It should be found somewhere around Ankledeep.

TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>Procurement of the thick-boned fish we need falls to you. It should be found somewhere around Ankledeep and can be caught using golden stonefly nymphs as bait.
TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Yes, perfect. This will do nicely, thank you!

TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>The tonic we make will help maintain the health of the plants themselves. We improved their surroundings─enriching the soil, adding compost, repelling insects and such─but nurturing the vegetables directly was something we were missing.

TEXT_BANMAM121_05281_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>As Anggir lent her expertise to the process, I have high hopes for the tonic's ongoing effectiveness. I also hope to have your continued assistance should we need another batch of ingredients!
